Select your Products from the list below. You can search for your products by entering the product name, ID, code, category or description text in the Find text box below and clicking the "Go" button. 20 products are displayed at a time. Click the "Previous Page" or "Next Page" links to view additional products. New products can be added by clicking the "Add New Product" link in the upper right hand corner of this page.
Active
Taxable

Enter a unique product name with price and cost. The optional product code is a merchant-defined identifier up to 15 characters. If the sale price is provided, the regular price is displayed striked-through in red (for a sales price effect). The special prices are for customers that have the special pricing option selected. Enter up to three quantities and discount prices per special price schedule (A,B,C). Indicate if this product is currently available for purchase, is taxable, if it requires a quantity entered, and if the customer can ONLY request more information about this product.

INVENTORY - Select the following checkbox to track inventory for this product. Enter the current quantity available in the Inventory textbox. Enter the quantity for reordering in the Reorder Qty textbox. A reorder email will be sent when the Inventory drops to the Reorder Qty or zero.

PRESENTATION - The following product image file and long description are displayed on the product detail page. The thumbnail image file and short description are displayed in the product lists. Click the question mark "?" in the upper right hand corner of the editor to get help.

CATEGORY - Enter a product category and sub-categories (separated by a back slash "\" with no spaces) and a sequence number for the user to browse this product by category. Each category has a maximun length of 30. The total category/sub-category length is 80.
Men’s Apparel\Formal Wear\Slacks
PACKAGE - If this product represents a package of other products, Enter the other product IDs below. The following Product IDs must start, end and be separated by a tilde (~1~2~).

CUSTOM USER INPUT -you can define custom input options for this product. Each user-defined Input Option starts on a separate line and can continue to the next line if too long. The Option name must be followed by a colon(:). If the name of the option starts with an Asterick(*), entry is required. A list of choices must be separated by semi-colons(;). If the name of the choice starts with an Asterick(*) it will be the default choice. A choice can be followed by a price in parathesis (2.00). Non-list options can specify the data type (type=text|memo|number|date), minimum and/or maximum values (min=xxx max=xxx), price in parathesis (3.00), width of text box or height of memo (size=xx), and a default value (value=abc). If a default value is specified it cannot include any spaces. If type=date, the min, max and value settings can be entered as NOW for the current date. A prompt can be included with the option name for input instructions (Size[Enter your personal size]:) and cannot include a colon.
*Size: Small; Medium; Large; Extra Large (2.00)
Small
Medium
Large
Extra Large (2.00)
*Color: *Red; Green; Blue
Red
Green
Blue
Monogram[Enter up to 3 characters]: type=text max=3 size=3 (3.00)
DIGITAL PRODUCT - If this product is digitally fulfilled by downloading a file, enter the name of the digital file.

SHIPPING CHARGES - Optional shipping charges can be calculated by total weight or by number of units(qty). Special shipping is manually calculated by the business. The shipping amount is per pound or unit. An Optional handling charge can be added per order.

RECURRING PAYMENTS / SUBSCRIPTIONS - If this product has recurring monthly payments (e.g. subscriptions), enter the recurring monthly price below. If there is a specific number of monthly payments, enter it in the Recurring Months. If the monthly payments are perpetual, enter zero for Recurring Months. Enter the Product ID to be used for the recurring monthly order.
EMAIL NOTIFICATION - The following email address(s) will be emailed a copy of each product order. Separate each email address with a semicolon.
Upload Image
Click the "Browse" and "Submit" buttons to select an image file to upload or select an already uploaded image below. Images must be under 50 KB in size with an extension of .jpg, .gif or .bmp.
Click on one of the following image file names to select an already uploaded file.
Upload Digital File
Click the "Browse" and "Submit" buttons to select a file to upload or select an already uploaded file below.
Click on one of the following file names to select an already uploaded file.
Pricing
